Posts.Title: Had VLNT or LVA? Please share here or message me! Nordy MRock

Posts.Content: Sannoliver1 wrote: Hi everyone. I'm new to this club :( I'm feeling really overwhelmed and am struggling to find the proper resources. I live in a small town with limited options but am considering hitting this LE with everything I've got early. I am looking for any guidance on inpatient CDT in the US (Seattle maybe?) for stage 1 lymphedema. Does that even exist? If not, I'd be willing to travel to one of the overseas clinics. Has anyone done this? You ladies further down the road are so helpful and willing to share your knowledge. I thank you in advance. Hugs Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: CDT in Seattle? Foldi Clinic? Sannoliver1 Sannoliver1

Posts.Content: May 13, 2016 11:22PM Sannoliver1 wrote: Oh that is terrible. I'm so sorry. How many lymph nodes did they remove? Did you have radiation? Do you wear compression? Did they have you wear it right after surgery? Do you get Mld? What does your surgeon say? Gosh I just feel awful that the LE spread to abdomen too. Sometimes life is so unfair.
Posts.Title: Lymphedema and Diep Sannoliver1 Sannoliver1

Posts.Content: Sannoliver1 wrote: To any who have lymphedema and still went ahead with diep reconstruction, could you please share your experience? How did you fare? Did things improve? Get worse? Stable? I have mild bilateral arm and truncal Lymphedema. I wear the garments and do mld, but have about 40 lbs more than I should. Also wondering how much weight loss helps with mild lymphedema. I just can't get any traction dropping the pounds because I'm not a slow and steady type. I'm all in and over do the exercise ... And then I flare so I back off. Thanks for any input.
